pages.title: Toretoise
pages.text: Spawning very rarely underground, these tortoise-like creatures grow various minerals on their back. You can mine them with a pickaxe, and regrow them randomly by feeding the toretoise Cave Roots. With enough thinking, this makes automatic mineral farms possible.

pages.name: Toretoise
pages.text: Good luck bringing them to the surface though. Maybe with a minecart?
